name: Super LOH
description: Plunge into an incredible atmosphere of Super LoH (Layers of Horror) ! Explore fascinating levels full of various monsters and and make enough money so you can buy gorgeous hat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
